ygData.subject: it ain't better
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried chain lightning on my Slime Lords scenario with my new PC. 128 megabytes and 1 ghz wasn t good enough to keep the game running smoothly.  It slowed

Subject: it ain't better

Content-Length: 412

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

I tried chain lightning on my 'Slime Lords' scenario with my new PC.  
128 megabytes and 1 ghz wasn't good enough to keep the game running 
smoothly.  It slowed down.  That brings me to a question:  What 
exactly is the slow point for 'chain lightning': is it the CPU or the 
amount of RAM or something else?  Is there anything specific that I 
can do to upgrade my PC NOT to have problems with chain lightning?
